md:
giải nghĩa từ "absorbs" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Absorbs (verb) - Hấp thụ
	+ Meaning: to take in and assimilate (energy, a liquid, etc.) into a substance or a system
	+ Example: The sponge absorbs water quickly.
	+ Related words: absorb, absorption, absorptive
	+ Antonyms: repel, reject

* Absorbs (verb) - Nuốt, tiêu thụ
	+ Meaning: to take in and assimilate (food, a substance, etc.) into the body
	+ Example: The body absorbs nutrients from the food.
	+ Related words: absorb, absorption, absorptive
	+ Antonyms: expel, eliminate

* Absorbs (verb) - Đánh chiếm, chiếm lĩnh
	+ Meaning: to take control of or dominate (something or someone)
	+ Example: The company absorbs its competitors.
	+ Related words: absorb, absorption, absorptive
	+ Antonyms: release, liberate

Note: The meanings and examples provided are not exhaustive and are intended to give a general idea of the word's usage.
